verbs.description: [ARG0: Bill Gates] [V: says] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump asked him , on two separate occasions , what the difference between HIV and HPV is] .
Bill Gates says that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: asked] [ARG2: him] , [ARGM-TMP: on two separate occasions] , [ARG1: what the difference between HIV and HPV is] .
Bill Gates says that President Donald Trump asked him , on two separate occasions , [ARG2: what] [ARG1: the difference between HIV and HPV] [V: is] .
